definition: to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: Nearly 20% of the bales were broken and the contents badly soiled.
sentences.chinese: 将近20%的包都破了，包内的货物严重污损。

sentences.english: Avoid defacing headliner inside the vehicle .
sentences.chinese: 避免污损头条新闻车内。

sentences.english: The staining and losing of the books and periodicals are the common phenomena in university library.
sentences.chinese: 书刊污损与流失是高校图书馆普遍存在的现象。

sentences.english: Defect detection is an essential step in paper currency sorting.
sentences.chinese: 污损检测是纸币清分中的一个重要环节。

sentences.english: What harm is there if thy clothes become tattered and stained?
sentences.chinese: 你的衣服污损了又何妨呢？

sentences.english: Why is sin described as "defiling" a person?
sentences.chinese: 为什么罪被形容为污损人呢？

sentences.english: If you spoil your paper, intentionally or accidentally.
sentences.chinese: 如果你故意或无意地污损考卷。

sentences.english: The same shall apply to stained or damaged imprinted stamps on postcards, aerogrammes and letter sheets.
sentences.chinese: 明信片及特制邮简上表示价格之花纹有污损时，亦同。
不要污损图书馆的书籍。

sentences.english: Please protect equipment and facilities, if there is any defile, you should compensate as its price.
sentences.chinese: 请阁下敬服设施装备，如有污损按价赔偿。

sentences.english: The youths used spray paint to deface buildings during the riots.
sentences.chinese: 这些年轻人在抗争时用喷漆污损了建筑物的外观。

sentences.english: Barnacle is one kind of marine fouling organism in the East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 藤壶是东海区主要的污损生物之一。

sentences.english: It is disgraceful this night of British pride has been sullied, " said a government spokesman."
sentences.chinese: “英国的荣耀在今晚被污损了，”一位政府发言人说。

sentences.english: This is about more than petty hackers who deface websites.
sentences.chinese: 这是关于多谁污损小黑客网站。

sentences.english: There is no discernable offset on the paper.
sentences.chinese: 这张纸上没有明显的污损。

sentences.english: Anything that tainted the image wouldn't be welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何污损形象的事情都不会受到欢迎。

definition: to alter (text)/to change by painting over/to correct (with correction fluid)
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
to lend/to put out a loan
